data.text: Dòun zunu, woilo ga pagɔ nà-ɠimala wooi ma,
naa ɠa a kɛ, è zoo kidafaawui la,
Mazɔlɔɔ wɛɛnziɛ anzanui laawooiti nɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ kɔin gulɔi,

Kɛlɛ ná-fai ɠaaɓelazuʋɛ ɠaa ɠa ɗa wana ga nu, eɠɛ siinziin ganigi, nii wanaai,5:4 siinziin ganigi, nii wanaai: Aɓisɛnte, tufa wanawanagi, é ɠɛni ga faa wanai (TSV 29:17; Zel 9:14; Amɔ 6:12) ɓaa kotoi ná-ani ʋili koozui ʋoogi (Gɔl 3:15; Kul 8:10-11).
Siɛ ʋelei ɠa ɗa li ga nui saai ʋɔ pelei,
É la ɗa ga yiizoolɛ ga, é ziɛ ga zɛnvu ʋelei,
Niizu deɠɛmu, dòun zunu, woilo gòoi ma,
Maaɠooza naama anzanui ma zii ʋa,
naa ɠa a kɛ, è mina è ɠaazu unfegi lɔ zunu ɠili zeezu,
Ni naa laade, è-mɔɔlɛzuʋɛ ɠa ɠɛ ga wɛɛinti daamiizu,
naa ɠa a kɛ, è mina li ɓalasu, ɗa-eteai ɠaaɓelazuʋɛ,
è mina ɠɛ ma:
Leeni vaa zu gè la ɠɛni woiloni nà-kalamɔinti gooiti ma?
Ná tago nɔ, gè ʋa ɠɛ maanɔɠɔi zu,
È-anzai ɠɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ zeɠe ɗɛi.
Mina è yiima vai yɛ ná, é ʋa ɗa yei taazuʋɛ peleiti su, eɠɛ ziɛi,
È yiima vaiti ti ɠɛ ga ɗa ɠila kpe nɔ ɗɔnɔ!
Ɠoozunɛ yeenɔpɛ su, wo eteai ziɛ ʋɔ, wa anzanui naa,
È-anzai ná-fai ɠaanɛɛʋɛ, ná-fai ʋagɛ eɠɛ dopai.
Dòun zunu, leeni vaa zu è ɠaazuɠulazu nu ɠili anza ʋa?
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa nui kpein siɛ ʋelei zumɔsu.
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui ɠa ɗa zo, tɔ ɓɔɠɔi ná-faaɠaaza golai nɔ zu,
Undaa ɠa ʋili, tɔɔzei é la zooni ɓɔɠɔ zosu,
